Halo: †hunders of Nazareth

Yo fellas 😎
My 12th usersight (and quickest one made) is a crossover between the iconic Halo CE Scorpion tank crosshair and the album cover of † (Cross) by Justice.

Making crosshair reticles from other FPS shooter games really is an untapped market for WT usersight making.
Two variants of the sight can be found: One with ballistics and one without.

WTDraw files inside, you know the drill at this point.

Both sights are universal and can be used on any tank, though use the one with ballistic ra...
